Classes/MDRequestHandler.html#/s:11Manga.abstract: User-Agent used for calls by this instance

Classes/MDRequestHandler.html#/s:11Manga.abstract: Boolean indicating whether the handler is ready to start performing requests

Classes/MDRequestHandler.html#/s:11Manga.abstract: Change the delay added before performing a POST, PUT, or DELETE request (in seconds)

Classes/MDRequestHandler.html#/s:11Manga.name: setMaxConcurrentConnections(_:)
Classes/MDRequestHandler.html#/s:11Manga.abstract: Change the maximum number of concurrent connections that will be made

Classes/MDRequestHandler.html#/s:11Manga.name: deleteCookie(type:)
Classes/MDRequestHandler.html#/s:11Manga.abstract: Delete the the cookie with the given type, if set

Classes/MDApiError/ErrorType.html#/s:11M.name: wrongStatusCode
Classes/MDApiError/ErrorType.html#/s:11M.abstract: The request completed with an unexpected status code

Classes/MDApiError/ErrorType.html#/s:11M.name: noDdosGuardCookie
Classes/MDApiError/ErrorType.html#/s:11M.abstract: No DDoS-Guard cookie was found in the cookie jar

Classes/MDApiError/ErrorType.html#/s:11M.name: captchaRequired
Classes/MDApiError/ErrorType.html#/s:11M.abstract: MangaDex decided that the user needs to solve a captcha before accessing the endpoint

Classes/MDApiError/ErrorType.html#/s:11M.name: rateLimited
Classes/MDApiError/ErrorType.html#/s:11M.abstract: MangaDex noticed too many requests in a short time period and returned an error

Classes/MDApiError/ErrorType.html#/s:11M.name: notReady
Classes/MDApiError/ErrorType.html#/s:11M.abstract: The requests was started before the MDRequestHandler entered

Classes/MDApiError/ErrorType.html#/s:11M.name: loginRequired
Classes/MDApiError/ErrorType.html#/s:11M.abstract: The user needs to be authenticated to perform this request

Classes/MDApiError/ErrorType.html#/s:11M.name: decodingError
Classes/MDApiError/ErrorType.html#/s:11M.abstract: MangaDexLib failed to parse the response returned by the MangaDex API

Classes/MDApiError/ErrorType.html#/s:11M.name: encodingError
Classes/MDApiError/ErrorType.html#/s:11M.abstract: MangaDexLib failed to encode the content of the request

Classes/MDApiError/ErrorType.html#/s:11M.name: actionFailed
Classes/MDApiError/ErrorType.html#/s:11M.abstract: The performed action failed with an unknown error

Classes/MDApiError.html#/s:11MangaDexLib.name: errorType
Classes/MDApiError.html#/s:11MangaDexLib.abstract: Type of error represented by this object

Classes/MDApiError.html#/s:11MangaDexLib.name: rawBody
Classes/MDApiError.html#/s:11MangaDexLib.abstract: The raw content returned by the MangaDex API which triggered this error

Classes/MDApiError.html#/s:11MangaDexLib.name: requestUrl
Classes/MDApiError.html#/s:11MangaDexLib.abstract: The URL which lead to this error

Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.name: networkBaseURL
Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.abstract: Base URL for the MangaDex network API

Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.abstract: Default value appended after the default User-Agent for all requests made by the MangaDexLib

Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.name: requestHandler
Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.abstract: Instance of MDRequestHandler used to perform all requests

Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.abstract: Session token provided by the API after login

Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.name: refreshJwt
Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.abstract: Refresh token provided by the API after login

Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.abstract: Setter for the User-Agent to use for requests

Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.abstract: Create a new account with the given information

Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.name: resendActivationCode(email:completion:)
Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.abstract: Ask for an activation code to be resent

Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.abstract: Start the recovery process for an account

Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.abstract: Commplete the recovery process for an account

Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.name: checkToken(completion:)
Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.abstract: Check that the current session token is valid and get its information

Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.name: createAuthor(info:completion:)
Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.abstract: Create an author with the specified information

Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.name: getChapterList(filter:includes:completion:)
Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.abstract: Get the list of latest published chapters

Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.name: getCoverList(filter:includes:completion:)
Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.abstract: Get the list of latest published covers

Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.name: createCustomList(info:completion:)
Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.abstract: Create a custom list with the specified information

Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.abstract: Get the specified custom list’s feed (aka its list of chapters)

Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.name: createGroup(info:completion:)
Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.abstract: Create a scanlation group with the specified information

Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.name: getChapterServer(chapterId:forcePort443:completion:)
Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.abstract: Get the MD@Home node URL hosting the specified chapter’s page images

Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.abstract: Send a report after fetching an image from a MD@Home node

Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.abstract: Get the mapping between legacy object IDs and new object IDs

Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.name: ping(completion:)
Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.abstract: Ping the MangaDex website to ensure it is up

Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.name: solveCaptcha(challenge:completion:)
Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.abstract: Solve a captcha challenge sent by MangaDex

Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.name: getMangaList(filter:includes:completion:)
Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.abstract: Get the list of latest updated mangas

Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.name: getMangaTagList(completion:)
Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.abstract: Get the list of existing tags for mangas

Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.name: createManga(info:completion:)
Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.abstract: Create a new manga with the specified information

Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.abstract: Add the specified manga to the logged-in user’s custom list

Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.abstract: Remove the specified manga from the logged-in user’s custom list

Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.abstract: Get the specified manga’s feed (aka its list of chapters)

Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.abstract: Get the specified manga’s aggregation of volumes and chapters

Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.name: getMangaReadMarkers(mangaId:completion:)
Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.abstract: Get a list of chapter ids that are marked as read for the specified manga and the logged-in user

Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.name: getMangasReadMarkers(mangaIds:completion:)
Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.abstract: Get a list of chapter ids that are marked as read for the specified mangas and the logged-in user

Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.name: getReadingStatuses(filter:completion:)
Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.abstract: Get all of the logged-in user’s reading statuses

Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.abstract: Get all of the logged-in user’s reading statuses

Classes/MDApi.html#/s:11MangaDexLib5MDAp.abstract: Update the logged-in user’s reading status for the specified manga

Classes/MDApi.html.name: MDApi
Classes/MDApi.html.abstract: The main MangaDex API class, which should be used to access the framework’s capabilities

Classes/MDAuthorFilter.html.name: MDAuthorFilter
Classes/MDAuthorFilter.html.abstract: A class used to filter scanlation group results during search

Classes/MDChapterFilter.html.name: MDChapterFilter
Classes/MDChapterFilter.html.abstract: A class used to filter chapter results during search

Classes/MDGroupFilter.html.name: MDGroupFilter
Classes/MDGroupFilter.html.abstract: A class used to filter scanlation group results during search

Classes/MDMangaFilter.html.name: MDMangaFilter
Classes/MDMangaFilter.html.abstract: A class used to filter manga results during search

Classes/MDPaginationFilter.html.name: MDPaginationFilter
Classes/MDPaginationFilter.html.abstract: A superclass for filters used during search

Classes/MDUserFilter.html.name: MDUserFilter
Classes/MDUserFilter.html.abstract: A class used to filter user results during search

Classes/MDResponse.html.name: MDResponse
Classes/MDResponse.html.abstract: A class representing a response returned from the MDApi
